entry.title: Saturday: Near blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
